ygData.subject: Re: Similar Problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Say Hail Tanden Nybright and he will talk to you. ... From: King, Darrin  To: eqpaladin@onelist.com  Date:
ygData.messageBody:
Say "Hail Tanden Nybright" and he will talk to you.
-----Original Message-----
From: King, Darrin <dking@...>
To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com' <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 7:24 AM
Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: Similar Problem


>From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
>
>*I seem to have found myself in a similar situation. I'm a fifth lvl
>*Paladin out of Felwithe, and for my first quest I was told to find an
>*Elf by the name of Tandan Nybright in Kelethin. I have searched all
>*over Kelethin and talked to many Wood Elves that call it home... yet no
>*one seems to have heard of him.
>
>He is "the drunkard," the High Elf NPC who wanders around inside and right
>outside Kelethin. I've not been able to rouse him from his drunken stupor
>enough to recognize his name, and our Guildmaster Tynkale asked.
>
>-- Amoroth
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>HOLD THE CAR CHASES. Had enough of manly military movies? Head on
>over to Chick Flicks. Every week Stacia picks the flicks women want
>to watch. http://www.onelist.com/ad/iVillage3
>
